A permit holder shall adhere to the following fire safety guidelines:
Functions as an indoor area;
Is within 15 feet of a fire hydrant;
Is within 15 feet of a pull-in bus stop;
Is within 15 feet of dumpster;
Is on a street with a running slope of five percent or more;
Is on a street with a posted speed limit above 30 miles per hour;
Is located in or interferes with the functions of forbidden road space;
Intrudes on the sidewalk;
Is not ADA compliant;
Is more than one level;
Obstructs visibility of a traffic control sign or street sign;
Blocks stormwater drainage; or
Permanently restricts access to utilities.

Is flush with the curb, and
Meets ADA compliance standards;

Be free of any tripping or slipping hazards; and
Incorporate lighting and reflective elements.

Other protective elements approved by BCDOT.
